form.title: Contact Us
form.intro: To get in touch with us, you may use the form available on our website, send an email to the address provided, or call us by phone. Our team will be ready to assist you and answer any questions you may have.
form.consent_text: I agree that this website may store my submitted information so that they can respond to my enquiry.

slide1.title: LASER SCANNING AND 3D SURVEYS
slide1.text: Laser Scanning and Point Clouds are advanced technologies that allow the precise capture of the shape and dimensions of objects in 3D.

slide2.title: 2D DRAFTING AND 3D MODELLING
slide2.text: We produce drawings and models using point clouds or any other available and preferred method.

slide3.title: UAV/DRONE PHOTOGRAMMETRY
slide3.text: Photogrammetry is the art and science of extracting accurate measurements and three-dimensional information from two-dimensional images.

laser.title: Laser Scanning and 3D Surveys
laser.text: We carry out architectural, heritage, commercial, and industrial surveys. We produce detailed As-Builts and offer specialised monitoring of historic buildings.

design.title: 2D Drafting and 3D Modelling
design.text: We produce floor plans, sections and elevations in DWG format. We work with 3D modelling in multiple software solutions, including BIM (Building Information Modelling) workflows.

drone.title: UAV/Drone Photogrammetry
drone.text: We support topographic surveys, industrial and residential photogrammetry, as well as the creation of virtual 3D models and digital

experience.title: Experience and Quality of Work
experience.text: More than 25 years of experience and cutting-edge technology ensure precision and detail in every survey and 3D model.

tech.title: Technology and Tools
tech.text: We use advanced 2D and 3D technologies, delivering reliable, efficient results ready to be integrated into your projects.

price.title: Affordable Pricing
price.text: Technical quality at fair prices, suitable for projects of any scale — from small refurbishments to large developments.

support.title: Excellent Customer Support
support.text: Close and transparent support at every stage, with continuous assistance and full dedication to the client.

contact_section.title: Get in touch
contact_section.subtitle: For any questions or clarifications, contact us.

texts1.title: Who We Are
texts1.about: The address of our website is:

texts2.title: Comments
texts2.about1: When visitors leave comments on the site, the data shown in the comments form is stored, along with the visitor's IP address and browser user agent, to help with spam detection.
texts2.about2: An anonymous string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be sent to the Gravatar service to check whether you are using it. The Gravatar privacy policy is available here:
texts2.about3: After your comment is approved, your profile picture becomes visible to the public in the context of your comment.

texts3.title: Media
texts3.about: When uploading images to the site, you should avoid uploading images with embedded geolocation data (EXIF GPS). Visitors may download and extract geolocation data from images on the site.

texts4.title: Cookies
texts4.about1: If you leave a comment on our site, you may choose to save your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to re-enter your details when leaving another comment. These cookies will last for one year.
texts4.about2: If you visit our login page, a temporary cookie will be set to determine whether your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.
texts4.about3: When you log in, several cookies will also be set to save your login information and screen display preferences. Login cookies last for two days and screen options cookies last for one year. If you select “Remember me”, your login will persist for two weeks. When you log out, login cookies will be removed.
texts4.about4: If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie contains no personal data and simply indicates the ID of the content you have just edited. It expires after one day.

texts5.title: Embedded Content from Other Websites
texts5.about1: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g.: videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves exactly as if the visitor had visited those websites.
texts5.about2: These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed third-party tracking and monitor your interaction with the embedded content, including tracking your interaction if you have an account and are logged in to those websites.

texts6.title: Who We Share Your Data With
texts6.about: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

texts7.title: How Long We Retain Your Data
texts7.about1: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are stored indefinitely. This is so that any follow-up comments can be recognised and approved automatically instead of being held in a moderation queue.
texts7.about2: For users who register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile.
texts7.about3: All users can see, edit or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit this information.

texts8.title: What Rights You Have Over Your Data
texts8.about: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you may request an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You may also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are required to keep for administrative, legal or security purposes.

texts9.title: Where Your Data Is Sent
texts9.about: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

serv1.title: Laser Scanning and Point Clouds
serv1.text: Laser scanning captures millions of points in seconds, creating highly accurate 3D point clouds. This technology enables the precise modelling and documentation of any physical space — ideal for architecture, engineering and construction projects.

arquitetonicos.title: Architectural Surveys
arquitetonicos.text: We are specialists in laser scanning surveys, producing accurate point clouds used to generate 3D models, floor plans and detailed elevations. Our experienced team works closely with clients to ensure solutions tailored to each project.

levantamentos.title: Interior, Exterior and Street Surveys
levantamentos.text1: We use laser scanning to map interior spaces, exterior areas and streets with high precision. We create detailed 3D models that support architecture, engineering, urban planning, rehabilitation and conservation projects. From building interiors to streets and squares, we deliver reliable data for analysis, design and

asbuilts.title: As-Built Documentation
asbuilts.text: We produce accurate technical documentation of the real-world state of a construction, ideal for refurbishments, extensions or alterations. Our As-Builts include floor plans, sections, elevations and construction details that faithfully reflect the executed work, serving as a solid basis for any future intervention.

monitorizacao.title: Historic Building Monitoring
monitorizacao.text: We use laser scanning to monitor historic buildings with high precision. This technology allows the detection of structural changes over time and supports conservation and restoration with detailed and realistic 3D models, essential to ensuring the safety and longevity of heritage sites.

introducao.title: 2D Drafting and 3D Modelling
introducao.text: We combine technical 2D drafting and 3D modelling to create accurate and realistic representations of spaces and structures. These tools enable efficient visualisation, planning and communication of projects — from floor plans and sections to detailed three-dimensional models.

plantas.title: Floor Plans, Sections and Elevations
plantas.text: We create detailed and precise technical drawings tailored to each client's needs. Our team combines 3D modelling expertise with the rigour of 2D drafting, ensuring reliable results delivered within the agreed deadlines and budgets.

modelacao.title: 3D Modelling
modelacao.text: We create accurate and realistic 3D models tailored to the needs of each project. We combine advanced technology with a highly experienced team in architecture, engineering and design, ensuring quality, deadlines and full client satisfaction.

fotogrametria.title: Photogrammetry
fotogrametria.text: We transform aerial images captured by drones into detailed and accurate 3D models. Using advanced software, we extract essential metric and three-dimensional information for architecture, engineering and planning projects.

tecnicas.title: Main Photogrammetry Techniques:
tecnicas.text1: We create high-resolution maps for agriculture, urban planning and environmental monitoring, ideal for strategic decision-making.
tecnicas.text2: We generate detailed three-dimensional models of terrain, structures and objects, useful in architecture, archaeology and construction.
tecnicas.text3: We carry out precise volume measurements for stock control, excavations and resource management in engineering and mining projects.

vantagens.title: Advantages of Photogrammetry:
vantagens.text1: Ensures highly reliable measurements and models, ideal for sectors that require technical precision.
vantagens.text2: Reduces time and resources by replacing traditional methods with aerial surveys using drones.
vantagens.text3: Detailed 3D models and maps make the analysis and communication of complex information easier.
vantagens.text4: Allows data collection in remote or hazardous areas with reduced human risk.
vantagens.text5: Applicable in areas such as forestry, mining and environmental studies, providing critical data for planning.

mdt.title: Digital Terrain Model (DTM)
mdt.subtitle1: What Is a Digital Terrain Model (DTM)?
mdt.text1: A Digital Terrain Model is an accurate three-dimensional representation of the Earth's surface, based on elevation points obtained through topographic surveys, drones, remote sensors or satellite imagery. These points are processed to generate a digital mesh that precisely reflects the terrain's morphology.
mdt.text2: The DTM is an essential tool for planning and analysis in engineering, architecture, environmental work and public infrastructure projects. It allows the calculation of slopes, volumes, infrastructure alignment, erosion risk assessment and drainage planning, among many other applications.
mdt.text3:
Together with contour lines, the DTM provides a clear understanding of altimetric variations. These lines connect points of equal elevation and are fundamental for producing topographic plans and geospatial analysis models.

At SupremeXpansion, we generate high-resolution DTMs tailored to the scale and detail required for each project, ensuring reliable technical data for well-founded decisions.

wrapper.title: Uses and Applications of DTM and Contour Lines
wrapper.intro: Digital Terrain Models and contour lines are versatile tools with multiple practical applications:
wrapper.text1: Accurate representation of terrain on topographic maps.
wrapper.text2: Planning works, roads and drainage systems based on terrain morphology.
wrapper.text3: Terrain analysis to support urban development and mitigate natural risks.
wrapper.text4: Study of soil structure and identification of geological formations.
wrapper.text5: Support in forest conservation, water management and sustainable land use.

nuvens.title: Point Clouds Using Photogrammetry
nuvens.text1: Photogrammetry is an advanced technique that transforms two-dimensional images into highly accurate three-dimensional representations. By capturing multiple photographs of an object or area from different angles and processing them with specialised software, it is possible to generate dense and detailed point clouds — sets of millions of points that represent the real geometry of surfaces, structures or terrain.
nuvens.text2: The process begins with image collection, usually performed by UAVs/drones or terrestrial cameras. From the overlapping of these images, the software identifies common points — called control points — and calculates their position in three-dimensional space. The result is a point cloud that accurately reflects the shape, dimension and texture of the captured object or environment.
nuvens.text3: At SupremeXpansion, we combine photogrammetry with our modelling and surveying expertise to deliver reliable point clouds, ready to be integrated at any project stage.
nuvens.subtext1: Ideal for measurement, documentation and modelling.
nuvens.subtext2: Applicable to terrain, façades, interiors, heritage sites, etc.
nuvens.subtext3: Reduces the need for traditional surveying equipment.
nuvens.subtext4: Enables analysis and simulations in a digital 3D environment.

aplicacoes.title: Applications of Point Clouds in Photogrammetry:
aplicacoes.text1: Generation of accurate topographic maps and digital terrain models.
aplicacoes.text2: Support for planning and monitoring works such as roads, bridges and buildings.
aplicacoes.text3: 3D documentation of monuments and historic sites for conservation and restoration.
aplicacoes.text4: Crop analysis, pest detection and efficient irrigation management based on terrain and volume.
aplicacoes.text5: Mine modelling, terrain analysis and evaluation of mineral deposits.

experiencia.title: Experience and Quality of Work
experiencia.text: With more than 25 years of experience in the sector, we provide an excellent service, combining cutting-edge technology with the know-how of a highly qualified team. We are specialists in architectural surveys and 3D modelling with laser scanning, ensuring technical accuracy and attention to detail in every project.

tecnologia.title: Technology and Tools
tecnologia.text: We work with the most advanced 2D and 3D technologies, ensuring reliable results compatible with current industry standards, optimising each project with tools that enhance precision, efficiency and final quality.

preco.title: Affordable Pricing
preco.text: We believe that quality does not need to be inaccessible. That is why, at SupremeXpansion, we provide excellent technical services at competitive prices, suited to projects of any scale — from small refurbishments to major developments.

suporte.title: Excellent Customer Support
suporte.text: We value relationships built on trust and transparency. Therefore, at SupremeXpansion we ensure close support throughout all project stages — from the first contact to final delivery. We are always available to answer questions, adapt solutions and ensure that every client feels informed, supported and fully satisfied.

resumo.text: In summary, we are an experienced company with cutting-edge technology, offering affordable prices and excellent customer support. We are committed to delivering the best possible service and ensuring that every client has an outstanding experience working with us.
